free_text.Learning outcomes: Ferroelectric Domain Walls : Understanding domain wall formation, structure, interaction with point defects, and dynamics
free_text.Content: [li]Domain wall formation[br/][li]Domain wall structure, spacing and periodicity[br/][li]Interaction of domain wall and point defectzs[br/][li]Dynamics of domain walls[br/][li]Influence of elastic and electric boundary conditions on domain walls[br/][li]Influence of domain walls on properties of ferroelectrics[br/][li]Experimental techniques for visualisation of domain walls and study of their properties.[br/]
free_text.Form of examination: Continuous assessment (oral presentation and written report)
free_text.Note: The course will be held in Chateau d'Oex; Up to 28 participants will be accepted on a first come basis. Deadline for registration is 30.11.2011.[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: BSc and/or MSc in Materials Engineering or  Physics
